TopicTitle: [WIP] Never Enuff Dakka:- A BDArmory expansion [Release 3]

Articles.Content:
Well I got the model done, but when I tried using it in-game, well it appears I made it too high-poly, makes the game lag out completely:

![T55fug.png](http://s22.postimg.org/ufzp0y21d/T55fug.png)

So I'm going to sack that one off for now and make an old Leo 2 instead:

![Leopard_2A4_Austria_4.JPG](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/ff/Leopard_2A4_Austria_4.JPG)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-11T19:19:08Z" title="05/11/2015 07:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 11, 2015</time> by PrototypeTheta**
Oh have a lot of big guns why not the turret from a Bradley IFV or a Russian BMP
BMP would work. I'd do the FV510 but that's the same gun as the Scimitar.

Any chance you can make a version of the Bofors 40MM that functions like the radial 105mm in standard BDArmory? (Where it's just the cannon and it has a limited turn and pitch radius?) I'd love to use it on this AC-130 design I'm making. I'd do it myself but I have no knowledge of how to work Unity and have a minimalistic scripting knowledge. :c
That wouldn't be too difficult, I'd simply have to take the casing off.
Oh, cool. Thanks for the quick reply too. c:

My friends and I have been wanting, for some time, a large calliber gun, 800mm Schwerer Gustav to be exact, and a Metalstorm-type stacked projectile gun.

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schwerer_Gustav](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schwerer_Gustav)

Well I got bored so there is now half a Gustav on my hard drive. I'll probably just give it to spoogle.

As for the Metal storm, I think I know how it can be done, I'll just need to make a new ammo type and restrict the amount of bullets contained in the thing.
Can we get a 10 cm gun?

Well I was planning a 105mm naval gun at some point.

Just need to decide on a specific design.

I've made a terrible mistake:

![2015_05_14_00001.jpg](http://s15.postimg.org/5e2fp5b7v/2015_05_14_00001.jpg)
I think the base is a little to small for the gun
The unwanted 7x rescale doesn't help. Though I'm kind of counting on players to build the rest of the base, so far I've only modelled the main bracket which the gun mounts on (and beefed that up).
What mod are you using for all the buildings?
